previewArticle.title: Real Salt Lake vs. New England Revolution | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Real Salt Lake 2, New England Revolution 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake will play host to their annual Independence Day festivities when they meet the New England Revolution Friday evening at Rio Tinto Stadium in a matchup of clubs looking to reverse recent skids.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Real Salt Lake vs New England Revolution | July 4, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Were under way in Salt Lake as Revs & RSL square off. Not cheering for the Revolution on the 4th of July is un-American… just saying #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We're underway at Rio Tinto Stadium, where the official game time temperature is 94 degrees for this Independence Day showdown. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Who dared @LeeNguyen24 to shave the sides of his head like that? :) #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Nat Borchers.
Attempt missed. Tony Beltran (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Javier Morales following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: James A. Little III
timelineItems.text: RSL playing great in the first 10 minutes. A dismantling of New England will help me get over the painful #USMNT loss. #RSL @MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Chris Schuler.

timelineItems.name: I Believe
timelineItems.text: BOBBY! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: The place would have erupted if Kyle would have scored that #RSL

timelineItems.name: Lane Sawyer
timelineItems.text: Sad that #USMNT is out of the #WorldCup, but happy to have the whole team back! Let's catch up to @SoundersFC now. Go @RealSaltLake! #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: It's going to be one of THOSE games, isn't it? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Nat Borchers tries a through ball, but Joao Plata is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: kristoph_pendleton
timelineItems.text: #rsl welcome back Beckerman and Rimando!

timelineItems.name: raulz801
timelineItems.text: Wonder how much Kyle and Nick have to get used to the altitude again. Nearly two months at close to sea level. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Morales.

timelineItems.name: mark_l_reece
timelineItems.text: Wife: whoa that @natborchers beard tho #RSL

timelineItems.name: Dan Brosgol
timelineItems.text: That yellow horizontal stripe on the #rsl shirt is so ugly. #unifail

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: Ball movement has been outstanding so far for #RSL

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: That was right to Daigo, who somehow left it. How was it a poor pass by Lee? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Joao Plata with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: #RSL has scored 5 goals between the 15th and 30th minute of matches this season. They have given up 3 goals during that time #RSLStats

timelineItems.name: Corey Capoccia
timelineItems.text: Can we put three passes together? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Revs Citizen
timelineItems.text: I think the #NERevs are going for a USA-Belgium type draw. God this sucks.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: #RSL is looking lightyears better than they did the past few weeks. Energy and invention from the midfield is sharp. #RSLvNER

timelineItems.desc: Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Chris Wingert undercuts Andrew Farrell

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution).
Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Haley Gonsalves
timelineItems.text: To clarify it's futbol not football - but as far as off-season activities go watching the runners kick the volleyball up and down the football field into the strange shaped lacrosse goals isn't to shabby! #rsl #soccer #real #touchdown errr I mean #goal

timelineItems.name: Jaxson
timelineItems.text: At the Real Salt Lake game tonight!!!!��� #soccer #rsl #realsaltlake #utah #saltlakecity #mls #fun #summer

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake).
Delay in match Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: PREST⚽️N CHITTY
timelineItems.text: Kyle and Nicky's welcome home reception just shook the Rocky Mountains! Welcome home boys! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Eric Mateer
timelineItems.text: Really disappointed to see @bbknighton not get the nod again tonight. Earned his spot. Can'tt blame last week's loss on him #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Monty Rodrigues
timelineItems.text: Farrell appears hurt, Wingert gets a yellow. Farrell holding his shoulder. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: ESPN 700
timelineItems.text: Did @wingert17 even touch him? #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Guessing a dislocated shoulder for Farrell based on the way he fell. Screw you, Wingert. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: Collar bone written all over that. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Real Salt Lake 2, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: One thing I don't like about this team is the way the players take after their coach in screaming at the ref. Not adult. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Renny Swan
timelineItems.text: #NERevs 2nd half performance better. 90 min result: getting-too-familiar disappointment.

timelineItems.name: Tony Anderson
timelineItems.text: Great to have Beckerman back! #USA #RSL #3Points

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Price
timelineItems.text: Is this what winning feels like? Man, I almost forgot. WE'RE HERE FOR #RSL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two penalties for @RealSaltLake see them past @NERevolution, 2-1: http://t.co/2qfYZTkhkH #RSLvNE http://t.co/Edf9TsxswM

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two penalties for @RealSaltLake see them past @NERevolution, 2-1: http://t.co/2qfYZTkhkH #RSLvNE http://t.co/Edf9TsxswM

timelineItems.desc: Real Salt Lake play host to their annual Independence Day festivities when they meet the New England Revolution Friday evening at Rio Tinto Stadium in a matchup of clubs looking to reverse recent skids.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Real Salt Lake vs New England Revolution | July 4, 2014

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Farrell stayed down for about a minute as the New England training staff came on the pitch. A couple of Revs are warming up now. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by A.J. Soares.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Wouldn't be very good if the Revs have to use a sub this early. Game time temp was 94 so subs will be needed late in this one #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Monty Rodrigues
timelineItems.text: Unless something changes quickly, it's not a matter of it, but when RSL scores. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Hope that @2Fast2Farrell's injury isn't as severe as it initially looked. Dislocated? Separated? No good regardless. Cc: @Tshilembi #nerevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth stops a long range Kyle Beckerman effort

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution).
Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Offside, Real Salt Lake. Kyle Beckerman tries a through ball, but Devon Sandoval is caught offside.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Kyle Beckerman.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth needs to get something sticky on those gloves. Twice tonight he lost the ball and almost led to RSL goals #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth spills his save and it almost leads to a goal. Defense does a good job of putting Sandoval offside #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Friday night battle between Real Salt Lake and the New England Revolution. Will RSL extend their winless run to 6? Can the Revs return to their scoring form from May? Find out Friday at 10pm ET on MLS Live.
timelineItems.title: Real Salt Lake vs. New England Revolution July 4, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: Marshelle Laird Rytting
timelineItems.text: Real game kisses! Haha #realsaltlake #rsl #mls #4thofjuly #merica #american #freedom #myfamily

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.
Tony Beltran (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Barnes is flirting with an early yellow. Appreciate the passion but head referee may soon show contrary feelings w/ a greeting card. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: That Nguyen blocked shot went just far enough to get me worked up. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake).
Attempt saved. Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Javier Morales.
Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Diego Fagundez.

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: Need to see a replay. Thought that should have been a PK #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chris Schuler (Real Salt Lake).
Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: RSL is dominating this game through 27 mins. Revs need to get it together #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: By my count, that's three juicy rebounds conceded by Shuttleworth. Where's Jack Edwards when you need him? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Sam Killen
timelineItems.text: Bobby is doing good but he needs to catch the ball so I dont get so nervous on the second chance. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Makes sense to me #RSL are starting Rimando and Beckerman. Both have fresh legs. KB didn't play vs. Belgium. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: OK, so maybe Soares is playing DM. I stand corrected. Curious idea, to say the least. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: The entire stadium is chanting Nick Rimando's name. Love the passion. #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by Daigo Kobayashi.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: I appreciate Farrell gutting it out but not sure that's a good idea. Looks painful. #nerevs

timelineItems.desc: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Lee Nguyen kicks Javier Morales

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Great defense from Kobayashi. Feel like he has improved his part of his game this year #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt Miller
timelineItems.text: The size difference between @2Fast2Farrell and Plata is ridiculous. The beard has this matchup won all night #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Penalty Real Salt Lake. Chris Schuler draws a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Darrius Barnes undercuts Schuler in the box

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Real Salt Lake. Conceded by A.J. Soares.
Penalty Real Salt Lake. Chris Schuler draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: The fact that the #NERevs are already battling the ref is not a good sign for the guests this early.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 1, New England Revolution 0. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Javier Morales slots home the spot kick

timelineItems.name: ESPN 700
timelineItems.text: Although no score yet, this has been a VERY fun game to watch #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Joe Gravellese
timelineItems.text: Oh JFC. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Wow. So that was the worst PK call I have seen in a while. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Paolo
timelineItems.text: the penalty is for....???? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).
Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: Awful awful call. That's terrible . #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Patrick Sullivan
timelineItems.text: Absolutely ludicrous. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Morales puts @RealSaltLake from the spot. 1-0 in the 35th minute. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Morales scores his fifth goal of the season, one behind the team lead (Joao Plata, Alvaro Saborio). #RSLvNE

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 1, New England Revolution 1. Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Darrius Barnes drives the free kick home with a diving header

timelineItems.comment: Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Melissa Kenny
timelineItems.text: Really not sure where that penalty was called against #NERevs but if it was about the SLC player on the ground he jumped and fell.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Sullivan
timelineItems.text: Love that karma. Back even. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake).
Offside, Real Salt Lake. Tony Beltran tries a through ball, but Joao Plata is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: And by curious, I meant to say "risky," esp. vs. #RSL. Soares has never played in the midfield during pro career.

timelineItems.name: Scott A. Lovelace
timelineItems.text: True to form defense craters 2 minutes after we score #RSL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @NERevolution waste no time to level the match. Darrius Barnes equalizes with a diving header. 1-1. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Barnes' second career goal. First came against the Red Bulls on Sept 22, 2012 #NEREVS #RSL

timelineItems.name: Jackie Anderson
timelineItems.text: Thanks for restoring justice, Darrius. What was that PK call?! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: If you believe then stand up on your feet... #RSL #Happy4thofJuly @RealSaltLake @RSL4Utah http://t.co/sngESi65Ff

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: If you believe then stand up on your feet... #RSL #Happy4thofJuly @RealSaltLake @RSL4Utah http://t.co/sngESi65Ff

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: I love Plata's work rate. He just busts his butt all night long #RSL

timelineItems.name: casibludorn
timelineItems.text: Cheering on Real! #realsaltlake #rsl

timelineItems.name: Alex DeJong
timelineItems.text: Who buttered Bobby's gloves? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Deadlock Victim ✡
timelineItems.text: Dammit Bobby... Spit, snot, phlegm, whatever. Just get some on your gloves. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chris Schuler (Real Salt Lake).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Not sure if I am thrilled with Bobby tonight. Great saves, but some were unnecessary if the ball was held on to. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Re the Barnes goal: 2nd career goal, playing in 108th career game. Just the 9th shot and 3rd on goal in career #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Tyler
timelineItems.text: Beautiful day for soccer #rsl #america

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Luis Gil (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Chris Schuler.

First Half ends, Real Salt Lake 1, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.name: Monty Rodrigues
timelineItems.text: 1-1 at the half. Could be a lot worse, I'll take it. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Don't know why #NERevs are always trying the cute/tricky play when the simple/smart play would be much better. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Don Ufficio
timelineItems.text: Gil with some beautiful through balls that half it must be said. #RSL #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Cassandra Lemus
timelineItems.text: There's no such thing as a Lemus Fourth of July without an RSL game! Happy 4th from Utah! #happyfourth #fourthofjuly #rsl #mls #soccer #riotinto #riot #utah #slc

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Would like 2 see Bunbury come in add speed to the Revs attack. Move Rowe inside w Nguyen see if team speed can create another chance #NERevs

timelineItems.name: M. Karyo
timelineItems.text: Half time, let's win this game #rsl.. Time to get into beast mode #RSLfam http://t.co/fApIvIvQ9K

timelineItems.name: M. Karyo
timelineItems.text: Half time, let's win this game #rsl.. Time to get into beast mode #RSLfam http://t.co/fApIvIvQ9K

timelineItems.name: Christina Seabock
timelineItems.text: Sometimes the owner of the company you work for gives you club seat tickets to the RSL Fourth of July game and it's a really good time @surgerone #fourthofjuly #rsl #spoiled

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We're back for the second half at Rio Tinto Stadium, where it has "cooled off" to about 91 degrees. #NERevs and RSL level at 1-1.

timelineItems.name: Wendy
timelineItems.text: Great finish to a fantastic 4th! #rsl #fireworks

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Real Salt Lake 1, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.text: Merica. #RSL http://t.co/w46YCOhNJy

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Bobby Shuttleworth officially made 3 saves on 8 shots faced. Felt like more, Opta. Felt like more. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Marshelle Laird Rytting
timelineItems.text: My rocker! She kills me. She wears her sun glasses at night #4thofjuly #merica #rsl #realsaltlake #metallica #mls #american #freedom #freespirit

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: Good movement through the midfield for #RSL. Oh how we have missed Kyle

timelineItems.name: The Original Winger
timelineItems.text: “@NathanCopier: @OriginalWinger how fit is Ned? Will we see him in the second half? #RSL” - Been training full speed... maybe

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: ON THE FOURTH OF JULY: Are you going to root for a team named for the American Revolution or a weird Americanized Spanish oddity? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brooke Runyan
timelineItems.text: @ronsterr13 @jephanisto #itstoohot. #rsl #riot

timelineItems.text: One day I'll be watching this little guy play here at the #riot! #goreal #rsl

timelineItems.text: #Futbolfrennnns #futbolfam #newrimfriend #jazzlion #holaole #rsl @itsacalling

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: If Paul Mariner says "naughty" one more time, I'm starting a drinking game. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Daniel
timelineItems.text: What a punk! He stepped on his back! #RSLvNE

timelineItems.name: Joe Gravellese
timelineItems.text: Blatant reverse-jinx attempt: Diego has been invisible #NERevs #RevsAfterDark

timelineItems.text: Apparent handball on line?

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Ref whistled before that ball went in, either way. And yeah. Handball. Phew. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Nat Borchers.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Guess that "handball" was the makeup call. Also, Bobby, hold on to it! #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Wow! What a pass from Nguyen to Mullins. That was gorgeous. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: @natborchers is a BEAST! Hustled back to spoil a potential opportunity for the Revolution #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Chris Tierney following a corner.

timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Chris Tierney trips Stertzer in the box

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: #MLS: How does the ref make that call? Did he actually see Morales handle the ball? #RSLvNE #RSL

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Bunbury in and Diego out. Not what I expected but Teal should bring the speed and energy. Diego looked like he needs a break #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 2, New England Revolution 1. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Joao Plata buries the PK in emphatic fashion

timelineItems.name: Lauren Braastad
timelineItems.text: AGAIN?!?! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Scott Sudikoff
timelineItems.text: But does seem like the right call. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Monty Rodrigues
timelineItems.text: That actually is the right call. Tierney shouldn't be diving in there. #NERevs 2-1 RSL, Plata, 65th minute.

timelineItems.name: Joshua Kakluskas
timelineItems.text: Sigh...that about sums up this current run of form. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Allen Chapman is not a popular guy in New England tonight. #RSLvNE

Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Love that quick take by the #NERevs to spring Mullins. Touch wasn't good enough though

timelineItems.name: Revs Citizen
timelineItems.text: Still need a striker, a #6, a wide midfielder, and a goalkeeper. Ironically, we needed all those things after last season. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) right footed shot from very close range is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Jaron Black
timelineItems.text: At the rsl game #rsl

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Beckerman has already delivered a few great balls tonight #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Tierney almost makes amends with a great cross but Mullins misses. Almost a carbon copy of Sandoval's miss early in the game #NEREVS #rsl

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Lee Nguyen with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Zendegi
timelineItems.text: No..no..New England commentators you can't start talking about the altitude now you are down. #RSLvNE @RealSaltLake

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Price
timelineItems.text: In case you were wondering, #RSL fans, apparently sacrifices to the Lord of Light, R'hllor, totally work.

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Kelyn with a perfect Wondowlowski impression there. #what #toosoon? #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Chris Tierney.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: #MLS: Looks like a dive by Stertzer. Already going down before he gets "touched". #RSLvNE https://t.co/4rezTlvWVN

timelineItems.name: Nathan A. Gower
timelineItems.text: The gif that keeps on giving: http://t.co/dhl1aSJIM6 #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: This is the first time #RSL has scored at least two goals since its 2-1 win over the Colorado Rapids on May 17 at Rio Tinto.

timelineItems.name: JK Branin
timelineItems.text: Somehow whipping in high crosses to plata seems less than ideal... Just saying... #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Chris Tierney (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Nick Kuehndahl
timelineItems.text: Having a great time at this Real game! #ihavealife #rsl #yes

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Foster
timelineItems.text: Beckerman and Rimando are home! Happy 4th! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Rob Gray
timelineItems.text: Nice to have Nick and Kyle back for the match tonight #RSL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Kyle Beckerman can not hit the target with his long range effort

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: If I am the #nerevs I am running in the box until a makeup PK is called for the first one.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Sold out #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN http://t.co/OADGMBfcCY

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Sold out #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN http://t.co/OADGMBfcCY

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: No better way to finish this 4th of July then 3 points #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Btw, before we dive into this #RSLvNE game, Happy Fourth, everyone!

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: We kicked the monarchy out of America 238 years ago, but someone let them back into Utah. Time for another Revolution! #NERevs #RSL

timelineItems.name: Lizz Summers
timelineItems.text: There's always something (more) special about hearing the National Anthem before a game on July 4 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: James Perry
timelineItems.text: Ok, for those watching #neRevs for first time there is no overtime or PKs

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: #RSL will be boosted with the return of #USMNT players, Beckerman and Rimando. Crowd gives them a huge welcome back during a special intro.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Apparently the 5-man backline we've seen during the #WorldCup is also coming into vogue in #MLS, as well. 5-4-1 for #NERevs? #shenanigans

timelineItems.name: Justin Bodily
timelineItems.text: Let the 4th of July riot begin #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Javier Morales.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Someone want to tell Heaps he's down one, away 4,200 ft above sea level and has 2 subs left w/15 mins to go? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Tonight's Fourth of July attendance at Rio Tinto: 20,513. Sixth sellout of 2014 for #RSL.

timelineItems.name: Andy Manson
timelineItems.text: I can hear my HS coach now "Soares, thats why you play defense!" #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 78' - Saer Sene coming on for NE

timelineItems.name: Rob Booth
timelineItems.text: Finally got our scarves #rsl http://t.co/n9b75yVkHk

timelineItems.name: Rob Booth
timelineItems.text: Finally got our scarves #rsl http://t.co/n9b75yVkHk

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Its a shame Barnes doesn't get more run. Works very hard and rarely makes bad decisions #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Charles Barnard
timelineItems.text: #RSL has only scored once in the 143 minutes that Stertzer has been on the field this season #RSLStats

timelineItems.name: elliedanger
timelineItems.text: At the #RSL game with my fella. Can't think of a better way to spend the 4th.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: New strategy - get in the box and flop. Flop like a Ben Affleck romantic comedy. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Javier Morales sends a free kick barely wide of the post

timelineItems.name: Joe Gravellese
timelineItems.text: #NeverForget the time someone posted on BigSoccer Revs board that we'd have nowhere to put David Villa because we have Mullins #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Monty Rodrigues
timelineItems.text: Final sub, Neumann for Barnes. Good job by Barnes overall. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Javi almost put that away. Just outside of the net. #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Neumann looks more comfortable every game he plays in. Really like how he's been playing as of late #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Kyle Beckerman.

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Would love to see that bleached mohawk head home a goal here, boys. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: You've gotta love the effort here by RSL. After struggling for 6 games they finally look like their old selves. #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.name: Benny Berrafato
timelineItems.text: #NERevs not threatening #RSL at all. Divine intervention may be required to salvage a point.

timelineItems.name: wendie ladie
timelineItems.text: I think fatherhood suits @natborchers! He has been a beast all night long! #RSL

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Did he shake the ref's hand thanking him for the penalty? #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Free kick for the revolution. This is dangerous. #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Javier Morales sends a dangerous shot just wide

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Mansally sub has pushed Morales higher up the field. He's staying mostly level with Sandoval as Abdoullie drops to defend. #RSLvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kyle Beckerman (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth gets low to deny a Kyle Beckerman attempt

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Where was that ball from Nguyen going? Communication issues, anyone? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Kenny Mansally.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: You know, if I am down by one in the 90' I like to pass it around in midfield. #nerevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by José Gonçalves.

timelineItems.name: Brian O'Connell
timelineItems.text: Barnes as MOTM is a good choice, even though he caused first PK. Dubious call. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Beltran (Real Salt Lake).
José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Imagine if the #NERevs had been playing the full field this whole game

timelineItems.name: Joe Gravellese
timelineItems.text: Whatever the #NERevs had going, the league apparently has figured it out. @NERevolution, time to make some changes.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).
Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Jefferson Curtis
timelineItems.text: Cassar "missed" kicking a ball that went out of play. Hilarious to see him pretend to not waste time. #RSL #MLS #1320KFAN

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Real Salt Lake 2, New England Revolution 1.
